Question.Subject: Beat anti-virus softwares?
Question.Content: my computer is infected with viruses....plz provide me the links of the best anti-virus software downloads dat are at the same time also free. plz asap... thanx..
Question.ChosenAnswer: antivirus tips and antivirus download: http://merakit-komputer.com http://merakit-komputer.com

Answer.Content:
I would Recommend Malwarebytes Anti-malware Though you might want to try downloading it on another computer and put the set up on a usb-drive (so the viruses don't screw up the set up), and then rebooting your infected computer into safe mode (Done by pressing F8 when you first turn it on) and then installing it. After that, run the scanner (takes awhile) and then it should show what viruses are on your computer.
Heres the link: http://www.malwarebytes.org/
Hope it works ;)
Answer.Reference: I used it for my computer and it scanned 87 viruses on my computer and got rid of them all for free (unlike Windows One-care, that found 0 for $50 a year. Fail Microsoft, FAIL).

Answer.Content:
You can use SpywareNoMore. As we all know Computer hackers seeking financial gain rather than thrills or notoriety are increasingly flooding the Internet with malicious software code (spyware, adware, key loggers, trojans). They are infecting computers with highly sophisticated programs that record surfing habits, bank passwords and other key financial data and send them to crooks over the Internet. These programs can be hard to spot, disguised in downloads such as toolbars, search engines, browser accessories, screen savers and other seemingly helpful utilities.
SpyNoMore anti-spyware safeguards your identity and restores system performance through fast, smart and powerful spyware protection. http://www.dvd-rip-software.com/Other-Software/Other_Tools/SpyNoMore.html
antivirus tips and antivirus download: http://merakit-komputer.com http://merakit-komputer.com
